reviews.review:
500 Stunden meines Lebens in diesem Game geopfert.

Ob ich es Empfehlen kann? 
Keine Ahnung 
Ob man es mit freunden spielen sollte? 
Keine Ahnung, man hasst sich danach irgendwie 
Kann man sich nach einem MM die Reise nach Russland sparen?
JA!
tahle hra vás přivede do hrobu ...

yes very good game mgk sparge garda intram peste tn

CS GO is a fantastic online game and has some realistic effects on it, playing on online servers with random players is joyful and u will never get tired of it.
Although the VAC system is a little lazy and detects cheaters in long time use, even after the game went free the free players join the game freely and has nothing to loose and it cause the new players are more addicted to use cheats and will be a cancer to CS GO in next years.
But if I want to come to a conclusion this game is a wonderful first-shooter and u will have fun playing and spending time in it.
Talking about the steam community, u can find every thing in public market and spending money on skins and other buyable items will double the fun with this game.
só tem arma e nada mais, bem simplório
Sözde Prime Status olmam gerekiyordu çünkü oyunu daha önce paralı olarak almıştım. Ancak şuan prime değil.
Gives much needed reality check on how bitter life is.

Been Playing Count-Strike games for over 15 years. They are all top quality shooters. This one is no exception. Content is always evolving while still retaining the classic core maps. I recommend this game to any FPS fan.
Spoko gierka ale robie to dla odznaki , JD i z wartem elo .
Its a good game to make friends and have fun, and also rage a bit and get into some funny fights in the voice chat.

So viele Cheater, Kids und Leute die das Gameplay stören. Einfach mal ewig AFK gehen im Match und andere Leute ständig als Cheater bezeichnen. Macht keinen Spaß, absoluter Mist geworden. Schade. Ich spiele es trotzdem weil es mir Spaß macht gegen solches anzugehen und diese mit Pixeln zu treffen.

Zudem ist meine Spielzeit nicht korrekt berechnet und diverse Erfolge habe ich 100% egtl schon gemacht. Einzigartige Programmierung stößt auf einzigartige Erfolge.

Prädikat Wertvoll 10/10 - Nein 100/100
